## Stacked bar plot for age distribution by gender

```{r}
ggplot(data = dat_aug_03, 
       aes(x = Age, 
           fill = Sex)) +
  geom_bar(position = "stack", 
           stat = "count", 
           alpha = 0.7) +
  labs(title = "Age Distribution by Gender",
       x = "Age Group",
       y = "Count") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("Male" = "darkblue", "Female" = "red")) +
  theme_minimal()

```
